page.title: 16CHILDREN'S LEISURE
page.content: In early spring, watching{television (weekend average - 4 hours per day) was the commonest leisure-time filler. On fine weekends this dropped considerably as they played outdoors with friends (most popular), went family shopping or visited relatives (although there was much breakfast time viewing). Hobbies include {cricket, tennis and cycling. Brownie {meetings}and{camp}are popular. Although one nine year old goes to bed soon after 19.30, the average bed time for nine to eleven year olds at weekends is 22.00 with much late T.V. viewing. For family{holidays,}3 out of 26 go abroad to Europe, 1 to relatives in Ireland, 12 to resorts in this country (popularly Devon and Cornwall), 8 remain at home taking day-trips, while two are undecided.
